Kyle Korver

Kyle Elliot Korver ▪ Instagram: kkorv26

(Threezus, Machine Gun, Hot Sauce, Splashton Kutcher)

Position: Shooting Guard, Small Forward, and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 212lb (201cm, 96kg)

Born: March 17, 1981 in Lakewood, California us

College: Creighton

High School: Pella in Pella, Iowa

Draft: New Jersey Nets, 2nd round (22nd pick, 51st overall), 2003 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 28, 2003

Career Length: 17 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Kyle Korver?

Kyle Korver is 43 years old.

Where was Kyle Korver born?

Kyle Korver was born in Lakewood, California.

When was Kyle Korver born?

Kyle Korver was born on March 17, 1981.

How tall is Kyle Korver?

Kyle Korver is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Kyle Korver weigh when playing?

Kyle Korver weighed 212 lbs (96 kg) when playing.

Is Kyle Korver in the Hall of Fame?

Kyle Korver is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kyle Korver drafted?

Kyle Korver was drafted by New Jersey Nets, 2nd round (22nd pick, 51st overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

What position did Kyle Korver play?

Shooting Guard, Small Forward, and Power Forward.

When did Kyle Korver retire?

Kyle Korver last played in 2020.

What is Kyle Korver's net worth?

Kyle Korver made at least $82,712,208 playing professional basketball.

How much did Kyle Korver make?

Kyle Korver made $7,560,000 in 2019.

What did Kyle Korver average?

Kyle Korver averaged 9.7 points, 3.0 rebounds, and 1.7 assists per game.

How many rings does Kyle Korver have?

Kyle Korver won 0 championships.

What is Kyle Korver's Twitter account?

Kyle Korver is on Twitter at KyleKorver.

What is Kyle Korver's Instagram account?

Kyle Korver is on Instagram at kkorv26.

What schools did Kyle Korver attend?

Kyle Korver attended Pella in Pella, Iowa and Creighton.

What are Kyle Korver's nicknames?

Threezus, Machine Gun, Hot Sauce, Splashton Kutcher are nicknames for Kyle Korver.
